infos.value: This is all «Nitor» of Hourne has to throw at us!? Come on!
(I hate to say it...but we might need to consider a retreat.)
(What are you saying, Brother!? The fight's only just begun!)
(I feel the same. We can't let Dorando and Gargas go unchecked.)
Th-this presence... Could it possibly be...!?
What's this? Discussing your retreat already, eh?
I crawled through hell and back to get another shot at ending you.
Another shot? Nah, it ends here.
You're eager, aren't you? Come on, then. Draw your blade.
